data.Name: Picturesque
data.Bio: American rock quartet Picturesque injected pop melody into their aggressive post-hardcore delivery, similar to band like I See Stars, Hands Like Houses, and Sleeping with Sirens. Formed in Lexington, Kentucky, the band is comprised of vocalist Kyle Hollis, guitarists Dylan Forrester and Zach Williamson, and bassist Jordan Greenway. The group got started in 2014 and also included founding members drummer Cole Clark and original bassist Robert Mote, who both parted ways with Picturesque in 2016. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Picturesque
